NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: GlassBreaker lets you anonymously expose harassment, corruption, and financial crimes in our workplaces and institutions... and bring their perpetrators to justice.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Anonymous smart contracts allow victims and perpetrators to negotiate monetary settlements - because complainants are anonymous, there is no fear of job loss or reprisal for bringing an action - unlike with conventional litigation. This is ADR... with razor-sharp teeth.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Pick the Privacy checkbox on signup to get bulletproof anonymity and mil-spec encryption of all data
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app

SIGNUP_PRIVACY_TEXT: We will never share your real name or email address publicly or with 3rd parties. But if you want more privacy, use the option below. Note that lost passwords can never be recovered with this method...
